responses: Hi there, how can I help?

patterns: What age has risk of breast cancer
Are younger age people less risk of breast cancer
responses: If you are over 50 years old, you have a risk of breast cancer
From 50 to 69 years old, you need to check mammography every year
Drinking 3 alcohol drinks per day can increase the risk of breast cancer
Drinking too much causes many cancer diseases

patterns: Does overweight increase the risk of breast cancer
responses: If your BMI value is over 25 or you are overweight, you have more risk of breast cancer
If you have any family person or relatives who have breast cancer, you might have BRCA1, BRCA2 gene
Family history of breast cancer can increase your risk of breast cancer

patterns: Which countries have high risk of breast cancer?
responses: You might have risk of breast cancer, if you are from America, Africa, Asia, or Latina

patterns: What are symptoms of breast cancer
How do I recognize changes of my breast realted to breast cancer
responses: your breats appear redness or flaky skin in the nipple area or the breast
your nipple discharge other than breast milk, including blood
any lump in the breast or underarm (armpit)
any part of your breast get thickened or swollen

patterns: what types of diseases increase risk of breast cancer
responses: If you have any breast-related diseases, you have the risk of breast cancer
You have any pain in any area of the breast and you need to visit a doctor
If you have radiation therapy to the chest including breasts before 30 years old, the risk of breast cancer increases
If you take external hormones like contraceptives, you have the risk of breast cancer
